Package agh.alleviation.service

Class HallService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.EntityObjectService<Hall,​HallRepository>
agh.alleviation.service.HallService
@Service
public class HallService
extends EntityObjectService<Hall,​HallRepository>
Service responsible for manipulating the hall repository.
Author:
Ksenia Fiodarava
See Also:
EntityObjectService, HallRepository, Hall
